name: The Sequential Mechanism
description: A complex mechanical device sits on a pedestal. It has multiple components that appear to require activation in a specific order.
promptTask:
Goal: Activate the mechanism.
Lesson: Sequential instructions in prompts.
Craft a command that provides a clear sequence of steps to activate the different parts of the mechanism in the correct order.
successMessage: As you follow the precise sequence of steps - turning the central dial clockwise, then pressing the red button, followed by pulling the side lever - the mechanism whirs to life, revealing a hidden passage.

feedback.noSequence: Sequence Error: Your command needs to specify a clear sequence of steps. Try using words like 'first,' 'then,' 'finally,' or numbered steps.
feedback.incompleteSequence: Incomplete Sequence: The mechanism requires multiple actions in sequence. Your command only addresses part of the process.
feedback.wrongAction: Action Error: '{action}' is not an appropriate way to interact with this mechanical device.
feedback.noTarget: Target Error: What do you want to {action}? Specify the components you wish to interact with.
feedback.wrongTarget: Target Error: There is no '{target}' here. Focus on the components of the mechanism (dial, lever, button, etc.).
feedback.tooGeneric: Detail Required: Your command needs more specificity about which components to interact with and in what order.
